SAIYA_Defend.NAME: Block
SAIYA_Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have !M! or more Ki gain an extra 2 Block.

EnergyBlast.NAME: Energy Blast
EnergyBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. If you have !M! or more Ki, consume it to deal an extra 2 damage to each enemy. Start a Combo.

PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Yell REALLY loud in order to gain !M! Ki and !B! block.

Medicine.NAME: Medicine
Medicine.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP and gain 1 Medicine. Insert a copy of this card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

KameHameHa.NAME: Kame Hame Ha
KameHameHa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy, consume !M! Ki. NL Combo Finisher: Costs 1 less energy per Combo Chain counter.

CCCapsule.NAME: C.C. Capsule
CCCapsule.DESCRIPTION: Get a random Ethereal Power, it costs 1 less Energy until played. NL Exhaust.

KaioKen.NAME: KaioKen
KaioKen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki, apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself. NL Exhaust.
KaioKen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ki, apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself.

MeteorDash.NAME: Meteor Dash
MeteorDash.DESCRIPTION: Dash at the enemy to deliver a heavy blow dealing !D! damage. Start a Combo

Endure.NAME: Endure
Endure.DESCRIPTION: Consume ALL your Ki, gain that much block.

BackAttack.NAME: Back Attack
BackAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Can only be used on vulnerable enemies. NL Combo Finisher: Apply weaken equal to your Combo Chain.

LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Consume ALL your Ki, gain 1 Strength for every !M! Ki consumed. Lose ALL Ki Regen. NL Exhaust.

Quickening.NAME: Quickening
Quickening.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Plated Armor and apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies. Consumes !M! Ki. Start a Combo Chain.
Quickening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Plated Armor and apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies. Consumes !M! Ki. Start a Combo Chain.

MonkeyTail.NAME: Monkey Tail
MonkeyTail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. Put a Full Moon and a Great Ape Form in your draw pile.

FullMoon.NAME: Full Moon
FullMoon.DESCRIPTION: The moon looms ominously in the sky.

GreatApeForm.NAME: Great Ape Form
GreatApeForm.DESCRIPTION: Can only be used on a Full Moon. Gain [E] [E]  at the start of every turn. Exhaust ALL your non-attack cards. Gain 15 Ki Regen, 8 Plated Armor and 3 Strength.

ConcussiveBlow.NAME: Concussive Blow
ConcussiveBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Concussion to the target.

BurningSoul.NAME: Burning Soul
BurningSoul.DESCRIPTION: Consume up to !M! Ki at the end of every turn in order to gain the same amount of Ki Barrier.

Scouter.NAME: Scouter
Scouter.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Ki to gain !B! block this and next turn. If the enemy is NOT attacking gain an extra 4 block.

Flurry.NAME: Flurry
Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy 3 times. If you have !M! or more Ki, consume it for an additional hit. Increases Combo chain.

ThirstForFight.NAME: Thirst for Battle
ThirstForFight.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy. NL Exhaust.
ThirstForFight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every buff on a target enemy.

Teleport.NAME: Instant Transfer
Teleport.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable to an enemy, Start or Increase a Combo Chain. Consumes !M! Ki.

DrainingStrike.NAME: Draining Strike
DrainingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain [E]  for each enemy hit with unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.
DrainingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain [E]  for each enemy hit. NL Exhaust.

Taunt.NAME: Taunt
Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Give an enemy !M! Strength, gain 1 Reflect.

KiExplosion.NAME: Ki Explosion
KiExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and !M! Ki Barrier. Consumes 10 Ki.

SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Stun an enemy for 1 turn. Consumes !M! Ki.
SolarFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stun All enemies for 1 turn. Consumes !M! Ki.

SenzuBean.NAME: Senzu Bean
SenzuBean.DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy a Second Chance. When it dies it is revived with !M! bonus Strength and can only take a third of its max HP of damage per turn
SenzuBean.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give a non-minion enemy a Second Chance. When it dies it is revived with !M! bonus Strength and Metallicize.

GenkiDama.NAME: Genki Dama
GenkiDama.DESCRIPTION: Consume all your Ki (up to !M!) and deal that much damage to all enemies. Gain 2 Weakened.
